keepsNodes.title: describe consumer group
keepsNodes.description:
Will show information of a specific consumer group.
Should be executed under the path where the kafka /bin folder reside.

keepsNodes.title: list all consumer groups
keepsNodes.description:
Lists all consumer groups.
Should be executed under the path where the kafka /bin folder reside.

keepsNodes.title: consume from beginning
keepsNodes.description:
Creates a consumer to read messages from a topic, from the beginning.
Should be executed under the path where the kafka /bin folder reside.

keepsNodes.title: create console producer
keepsNodes.description:
Will create a console producer for a topic, to send messages manually.
Should be executed under the path where the kafka /bin folder reside.

keepsNodes.title: consume from now
keepsNodes.description:
Creates a consumer to read messages from a topic, only new messages.
Should be executed under the path where the kafka /bin folder reside.

keepsNodes.title: create
keepsNodes.description:
Creates a new topic.
Should be executed under the path where the kafka /bin folder reside.

keepsNodes.title: delete
keepsNodes.description:
Deletes a topic.
Should be executed under the path where the kafka /bin folder reside.

keepsNodes.title: describe all
keepsNodes.description:
Describes details of all topics.
Should be executed under the path where the kafka /bin folder reside.

keepsNodes.title: list
keepsNodes.description:
Lists all topics.
Should be executed under the path where the kafka /bin folder reside.

keepsNodes.title: describe a topic
keepsNodes.description:
Will descibe a single topic.
Should be executed under the path where the kafka /bin folder reside.
